articles.description: Why Ben Stokes is bowling as well as he has ever done after years of knee problems.

articles.description: England manager Sarina Wiegman is "not for sale at any price", says the Football Association chief executive officer Mark Bullingham.

articles.description: Newcastle have not named striker Alexander Isak in their squad for a pre-season tour of Asia.

articles.description: FA chief executive Mark Bullingham says VAR interrupts the game enough and should not have more powers.
articles.title: VAR: No need for technology to extend its power, says FA chief

articles.description: Britain's Emma Raducana is through to the quarter-finals of the Washington Open after beating Naomi Osaka in straight sets but Cameron Norrie and Dan Evans lose.
articles.title: Washington Open: Emma Raducanu beats Naomi Osaka but Cameron Norrie & Dan Evans lose in DC

articles.description: The verdict marks the end of the highly-publicised case, in which the men were accused of sexually assaulting a woman in 2018.
articles.title: Five ice hockey players found not guilty in Canada sexual assault case

articles.description: Garry Ringrose's withdrawal from the British and Irish Lions team to face Australia shows how seriously current players take concussion, says former wing Ugo Monye.
articles.title: Australia v British and Irish Lions: Garry Ringrose decision shows concussion focus - Ugo Monye

articles.description: Max Verstappen says Christian Horner's removal as Red Bull team principal has no impact on the decision about his own future.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix: Max Verstappen says his Red Bull future not impacted by Christian Horner's exit

articles.description: Robert Whittaker had his bottom teeth dislodged in defeat by Khamzat Chimaev in October but is set to return to action against Reinier de Ridder in Abu Dhabi on Saturday.
articles.title: UFC Abu Dhabi: Robert Whittaker returns against Reinier de Ridder after squeamish injury

articles.description: Liverpool are ready to break the British transfer record again for Alexander Isak and Newcastle are lining up Benjamin Sesko as a potential replacement, plus more.
articles.title: Football gossip: Isak, Sesko, Watkins, Son, Luis Diaz, Konate, Endrick, Elliott, Sterling
